## Question 2

In this example, we will run the code but *not* print the raw code. So, just the output will be rendered. This is done using "hash pipes" (`#|`) at the top of chunks.

```{r}
#| echo: FALSE
1+1
```

## Question 3

We can include figures...

```{r}
x <- seq(1, 10, by=1)
y <- seq(1, 10, by=1)
plot(y~x)
```

...and then use hash pipes to add a caption, change figure size, change alignment, etc.

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "A basic plot"
#| fig-width: 7
#| fig-height: 5
#| fig-align: right
plot(y~x)
```
